column.name: htmlheader
column.value:
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" media="all" href="/webadmin/jscalendar/skins/aqua/theme.css" />
<script type="text/javascript" src="/webadmin/jscalendar/calendar.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="/webadmin/jscalendar/lang/calendar-en.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="/webadmin/jscalendar/calendar-setup.js"></script>
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"
href="/webadmin/webeditor/webeditor.css" />
<script src="/webadmin/webeditor/webeditor.js"></script>
<script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript">
function FieldControl(element, message) {
alert(message);
element.focus();
}
function CheckForm(theform) {
var FormOK = false;
if (theform.From.value == "") {
FieldControl(theform.From, "Please select a From date.");
}
else if (theform.To.value == "") {
FieldControl(theform.To, "Please select a To date.");
}
else if (theform.To.value < theform.From.value) {
FieldControl(theform.To, "To date is before From date.");
}
else if (theform.Title.value == "") {
FieldControl(theform.To, "Please enter a title for the event.");
}
else {
FormOK = true;
}
return FormOK;
}
function CopyFromDate(theform) {
if (newevent.To.value == "") {
newevent.To.value=newevent.From.value;
}
else if (newevent.From.value > newevent.To.value) {
newevent.To.value=newevent.From.value;
}
}
</script>
